name: veilscope
description: Veilscope is a static marketing site that introduces an AI-powered platform for translating SEC filings into plain-language risk scorecards. It includes a hero landing page, supporting content for investors, a team profile, contact form, and a prototype of the in-product web app experience. 【F:index.html†L33-L134】【F:learn-more.html†L37-L196】【F:about.html†L40-L124】
